name: webhook_docusign_contract_signed
title: Capture Document Signatures in Docusign
description: Many organizations use Docusign to control agreements – such as Non-Disclosure Agreements (NDAs), Lease Contracts, and Terms of Service (TOS) – that dictate which resources users can access. This template leverages Docusign webhooks to capture when a user signed a document. This information is used by Okta do determine which systems a user can access.
